verses.name: Genesis 49:18
verses.text: I have waited for thy salvation, O Lord.

verses.name: Genesis 49:19
verses.text: Gad, a troop shall overcome him: but he shall overcome at the last.

verses.name: Genesis 49:20
verses.text: Out of Asher his bread shall be fat, and he shall yield royal dainties.

verses.name: Genesis 49:21
verses.text: Naphtali is a hind let loose: he giveth goodly words.

verses.name: Genesis 49:22
verses.text: Joseph is a fruitful bough, even a fruitful bough by a well; whose branches run over the wall:

verses.name: Genesis 49:23
verses.text: The archers have sorely grieved him, and shot at him, and hated him:
